channel.title: Project godz hell v5 client help
channel.description:
i need help with project godz hell v5: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442490.msg3993297.html#msg3993297 1.items I.So when i right click on items, i get these options for eg.. if i right click santa hat.. Santa Hat Santa Hat Santa Hat Santa Hat Santa Hat Wear Santa Hat Use Santa Hat Drop Santa Hat Examine Santa Hat Cancel Can someone please help II. when ever i add new item it turns to "null" please help
2.colors: can some one tell me how to get the colors back please I dont know how to put colors back in source or client, i will rep for any one that helps. "quoted on the source it says fewer colors on client" how do i get these colors back.. i will uses httml , xml , javascript , or @color@, just teach me how to put them back on client this is the main thing i want; the colors

item.title: Project godz hell v5 client help
item.dc:creator: @abk14101 abk14101
item.description:
@abk14101 wrote:

i need help with project godz hell v5: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,442490.msg3993297.html#msg3993297
1.items
I.So when i right click on items, i get these options
for eg… if i right click santa hat…
Santa Hat
Santa Hat
Santa Hat
Santa Hat
Santa Hat
Wear Santa Hat
Use Santa Hat
Drop Santa Hat
Examine Santa Hat
Cancel
Can someone please help
II. when ever i add new item it turns to “null” please help

2.colors: can some one tell me how to get the colors back please
I dont know how to put colors back in source or client, i will rep for any one that helps.
“quoted on the source it says fewer colors on client” how do i get these colors back… i will uses httml , xml , javascript , or @color@, just teach me how to put them back on client
this is the main thing i want; the colors

Read full topic
item.source: Project godz hell v5 client help
